title: Tur, Markazi
text: Tur (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Ţūr and Toor) is a village in <a href="Saruq%20Rural%20District%20%28Markazi%20Province%29">Saruq Rural District</a>, <a href="Saruq%20District">Saruq District</a>, <a href="Farahan%20County">Farahan County</a>, <a href="Markazi%20Province">Markazi Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 845, in 212 families.
